title: Separate
text: Separate the exponent to $$-1$$ and $$\frac{1}{3}$$, so $${64}^{\left(-\frac{1}{3}\right)}={\left({64}^{\frac{1}{3}}\right)}^{\left(-1\right)}$$

title: Simplify
text: What is the cube root of 64?

title: Substitute
text: Substitute the value for the cube root of $$64$$ and simplify the expression. What is $$4^{\left(-1\right)}$$?
